s: The company has been around for ... into audio almost 18 yrs ago. I am happy to find that NHT is still in business and surprisingly still makes the same design 18 yrs later. They still use a soft dome for the tweeter and a paper cone mid-range driver. Up to this day I must say that this design still works just as good as the newer speaker designs from other brands...
